attributes.action: request that the BBC to get rights to show new seasons of Stargate SG1
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The SCI-FI channel has discontinued Stargate SG1. But a British channel can still have the rights to air the show. Please keep our show by asking the BBC to consider taking it on one of their many channels they have. We pay for our TV liscense and its time we saw something good on the BBC anyway.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
